description: This file defines a React functional component named Editor that provides UI and logic for editing a note's title and content. It manages local state, syncs with external note prop, and handles user input and save actions.

methods.name: Editor({ note, onChange, onSave, isSaving, banner, })
methods.description: React functional component for editing notes, controls local state and communicates changes via callbacks.

methods.name: handleField
methods.description: Handles user input for note's title and content, updates local state, and triggers onChange callback.
